pr_title: [Dart] Removal of deprecated Dart generators and generated code

timeline.message: Remove supportDart2 and browserClient from docs
Revert removal of credits of dart(1)

timeline.bodyText:
Minor suggestion to revise as follows to make it clear the output is for Dart 2.x:
Generates a Dart 2.x client library.
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: Why make it dart2 specific while dart 1.x support is being removed?
replies.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: To avoid any surprise to new users who may expect the output to work with Dart 1.x.
replies.author: wing328
